EnhancedContent: Hello all, I have a weird issue. Somehow I have pinned File Explorer to the taskbar and with the tweaking I've been doing "unpinning" it isn't an option. When I right click it it just shows File Explorer (see image). That is what I see when right clicking. The shortcut works I just don't want it in my taskbar. Any help would be appreciated.
Author: Fitzgerald
Title: Can't unpin from Takbar
Description: Hello all, I have a weird issue. Somehow I have pinned File Explorer to the taskbar and with the tweaking I've been doing "unpinning" it isn't an option. When I right click it it just shows File Explorer (see image). That is what I see when right clicking. The shortcut works I just don't want it in my taskbar. Any help would be appreciated.
